<div class="partner-container">
  <p class="intro-text">We accept institutional memberships from departments, faculties, units, or central institutions of the LMU, which provide infrastructure or other services that facilitate the goals of the OSC.</p>
  
  <div class="partners-grid">
    <div class="partner-card" id="funding-members">

      <div class="card-content">
        <p>Funding institutional members provide the OSC with a yearly membership fee to get priority in our training programmes and consultations.</p>
        <a href="funding_institutional_members.html" class="partner-button">View Funding Institutional Members</a>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <div class="partner-card" id="associate-members">
      <div class="card-header">
        <h2 class="partner-subheading">Affiliate Institutional Members</h2>
      </div>
      <div class="card-content">
        <p>Affiliate institutional members share the goals of the OSC and provide support in kind (e.g. infrastructure, services, collaborations).</p>
        <a href="affiliate_institutional_members.html" class="partner-button">View Affiliate Institutional Members</a>
      </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class ="becoming-partner-info">
  <h2 class = "partner-subheading">Becoming OSC Institutional Member</h2>
  <p class="intro-text mt-3">In practice, institutional members contribute as little as a statement of commitment to work towards the OSC goals - they then become Affiliate Institutional Members. Institutional Members are also encouraged to provide yearly funds to the OSC (depending on the size of the institution) - they then become Funding Institutional Members.</p>
